scripts.install-all: npm install -g ntl && mkdir logs && npm i && cd src\server && npm i && cd.. && cd client && npm i typescript@3.1.6
scripts.server:start-dev: SET port=8001 && SET dev = true && nodemon --inspect ./src/server/dist/dev/server.js
scripts.server:start-prod: SET prod = true && SET port=8010 && node ./dist/server.js
